subsections.title: What is Next.js?
subsections.content: Next.js is a powerful React framework that enables several extra features, including server-side rendering and generating static websites for React-based web applications.

quizzes.question: What framework does Next.js build upon?
Which of the following is a feature of Next.js?

subsections.title: Setting Up a Next.js Project
subsections.content: To start using Next.js, you will need to install Node.js on your machine and create a new Next.js project using create-next-app. This tool simplifies the setup process for you.

quizzes.question: What tool simplifies setting up a Next.js project?
What is the initial command to start a Next.js project using create-next-app?

subsections.title: Basic Structure of a Next.js Project
subsections.content: A Next.js project is structured to include pages, components, and public directories which serve as the basis for routing, UI components, and static file management respectively.
